sense.gloss: before, earlier, previously, prior, ago, (minutes) to (the hour)
(the) front, frontal part, fore, head (e.g. of a line)
previous (e.g. page), prior (e.g. engagement), first (e.g. half), former (e.g. example)
front (of one's body or clothing), breast (of a coat, kimono, etc.)

sdata.j: お|まえ|ってほんとに↑正↑↓ただ↓しい↑優先↑↓ゆうせん↓↑順位↑↓じゅんい↓がわかってないな。
sdata.e: You really don't have the right priorities!

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑名前↑↓な|まえ|↓はジャックです。
